QuestLocation3: Gramados Royal Arsenal Museum Marksman's gallery
Title: Step 3: Explore the Museum
Text: I've spoken with Curator Evelyn Marston, and she has guided me to the museum exhibits. I need to explore the museum to learn more about the history of Gramados' military and marksmanship. I'll need to visit the various exhibits across the two houses, paying special attention to the marksman’s gallery on the third floor of the east house.
CompleteText: I've explored the museum and gained a deeper understanding of Gramados' military history and the legacy of its marksmen. The exhibits provided valuable insights, especially the marksman’s gallery. I should return to Curator Evelyn Marston to discuss what I've learned.
NextQuestTitle: Step 4: Return to Curator Evelyn Marston
